scripts.start: concurrently --raw 'npm run start --workspace packages/graphql-server' 'npm run start --workspace packages/website' 'npm run start --workspace packages/web-admin'
scripts.start:dist: concurrently --raw 'npm run start:dist --workspace packages/graphql-server' 'npm run start:dist --workspace packages/website' 'npm run start:dist --workspace packages/web-admin'
scripts.build:dist: concurrently --raw 'npm run build:dist --workspace packages/graphql-server' 'npm run build:dist --workspace packages/website' 'npm run build:dist --workspace packages/web-admin'
